segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, the woman’s drying dishes so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no clue about the faucet running wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water’s everywhere, pooling on the floor like a lake.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s gross how it’s soaking into everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe’s wet, and she just stands there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy’s on that stool fishing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got the jar open, looks like a fun adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool’s shaky, but he’s hanging on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl’s below, hand up, excited for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re being sneaky, giggling inside I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a lovely garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that water mess is turning my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand the sloppiness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
